name: Geneforge 2
description: Geneforge 2 is an Indie fantasy role-playing adventure with a science fiction twist. Explore a huge world, choose which side you will fight for, and make your own horde of completely obedient mutant monsters. Geneforge 2 has a huge and open storyline. You can join with any of several factions and reach dozens of different endings.
minimum_requirements: Operating system:Windows® XP / Vista™ / Windows® 7 Processor:1.6 GHz CPUMemory:512 MB Hard disk space:300MB Video: OpenGL compliant graphics cardSound:Sound card
